roadmap.bad_decoding:
The file seems to use an unknown encoding as the interpreted text contains the character '�' which indicates that a character could not be interpreted correctly (probably Å, Ä or Ö).
You can still use this file, but if you are not completely sure that it *should* contain the character '�' it is recommended that you convert the file to UTF-8 encoding and try again.
roadmap.scale_deprecated: The 'Scale' column is not supported and will be ignored.
roadmap.scale_deprecated_extended: $t(forms:roadmap.scale_deprecated) If the column contains any scales, please bake them into the unit or value instead. Example: unit 'MW' rather than unit 'kW' with scale 'thousand'.
roadmap.file_read_error: The file could not be read: {{error}}
roadmap.relationship_legend: Specify the relationship to other posts
roadmap.relationship_label: {{$t(common:meta_roadmap), titleCase}} that this is a new post in
roadmap.relationship_no_found: You seem to not have access to any $t(common:meta_roadmap)
roadmap.roadmap_target_label: Version of $t(common:meta_roadmap_definite) {{targetName}} this $t(common:meta_roadmap_definite) is working towards
roadmap.goal_accepted_formats: {{$t(common:goal_other), titleCase}} <small> - accepted file types: {{fileTypes, list}} - accepted file encodings: {{encodings, list}}</small>

goal.choose_relationship: Specify the relationship to other posts
goal.data_series_type_legend: Choose type of data series for your $t(common:goal_one)
goal.choose_goal_data_series: Describe how your {{$t(common:goal_one), possessive}} data is structured
goal.baseline_label: Which baseline should be used when calculating {{$t(common:action_other), possessive}} $t(common:effect_other) on this $t(common:goal_one)?
goal.custom_baseline_title: Use numeric values, separated by semicolons or tabs. Decimal numbers may use dots or commas as decimal separators.
goal.feature_this_goal: Do you want to feature this $t(common:goal_one) in your $t(common:roadmap_version_one)?
goal.scale_deprecated: This $t(common:goal_one) contains a scale. Please bake the scale into the value or unit and then check this box. All scales will be removed in the future
goal.unit_not_interpreted: The unit could not be interpreted. You can still save the $t(common:goal_one), but some functionality may be missing.
goal.data_series_info:
The "Data series" field accepts a series of values separated by semicolons or tabs, which means you can paste a series of values from Excel or similar.
NOTE: Values must not be separated by commas (",").
Decimal numbers can use either decimal points or decimal commas.
The first value represents the year 2020 and the series can continue up to the year 2050 (a total of 31 values).
If values are missing for a year, you can leave it blank, for example ";1;;;;5" can be used to specify the values 1 and 5 for the years 2021 and 2025.
goal.data_series_title: Use numeric values separated by semicolons or tabs. Decimal numbers can use either dots or commas.
goal.select_roadmap_version: Select a $t(common:roadmap_version) to inherit a $t(common:goal_one) from
goal.select_goals_to_combine: Select $t(common:goal_other) in the current $t(common:roadmap_version) to combine
goal.search_tip: Tip: use <kbd><kbd>CTRL</kbd> + <kbd>F</kbd></kbd> to find the $t(common:goal_other) you are looking for
goal.invert_goal: Invert the $t(common:goal_one) (divide by this $t(common:goal_one) rather than multiply)
goal.select_goal_as_baseline: Select a $t(common:goal_one) to use as a baseline (values are copied rather than linked)
